page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JASON
page.content: My name is Jason Cockburn.I am eleven years old.Every morning I get up for school at 8.30.School starts at 9.00. I get a bowl of Sugar Puffs and a cup of tea for my breakfast.I get my school clothes on these are usually a grey jumper and a pair of black trousers.I get a wash.Then I go to school.When the bell rings I rush in class.To start the day we have assembly.At half past ten it is playtime.I play football with my friends,Christopher,Roger,Daniel and Stephen it is great fun to play.At twelve o'clock we have dinner.My class 3,put out the chairs and put them away afterwards.At half past three I go home for tea.Then I go over the play area until 6.00.At nine o'clock I have my supper.Then I watch television my best programmes are sport and Quizes BY J.COCKBURN AGE 11
